nodeList.loreText: Your minions are created to serve you one way or another
nodeList.nodeDescription: Rips apart an allied minion, dealing physical damage to enemies around it. Added damage applies at double effectiveness.

nodeList.description: Sacrifice deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Sacrifice costs more mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [15%] increased damage per point. [5%] increased mana cost per point.

node.loreText: Your minions are created to serve you one way or another
node.nodeDescription: Rips apart an allied minion, dealing physical damage to enemies around it. Added damage applies at double effectiveness.

nodeList.altText: {Blood Wraiths} have a base of 100 health, decay over time, and use melee attacks.
nodeList.description: {Blood Wraiths} have a chance to cause enemies to bleed. Blood Wraiths consume less mana when summoned.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Blood Wraiths have [34%] additional chance to inflict bleeding on hit per point

node.altText: {Blood Wraiths} have a base of 100 health, decay over time, and use melee attacks.
node.description:
When you sacrifice a minion you have a chance to assemble a {Blood Wraith} from the remains. 15 mana is consumed when you summon a Blood Wraith. 

You cannot summon a Blood Wraith by sacrificing a Blood Wraith or when your mana is negative and below -100.
node.nodeDescription:
When you sacrifice a minion you have a 15% chance to assemble a blood wraith from the remains.

This effect cannot trigger if the minion you sacrifice is a blood wraith.

Blood wraiths are melee minions that lose health at an accelerating rate.

nodeList.altText: {Blood Wraiths} have a base of 100 health, decay over time, and use melee attacks.
nodeList.description: {Blood Wraiths} summoned by Sacrifice have more maximum health and deal more damage (both multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Blood Wraiths have [30%] more health and damage (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.loreText: Your minions are created to serve you one way or another
node.nodeDescription: Rips apart an allied minion, dealing physical damage to enemies around it. Added damage applies at double effectiveness.

nodeList.description:
Sacrificing a minion always creates a {Blood Wraith}.

Blood Wraiths summoned by Sacrifice have significantly more maximum health and damage (both multiplicative with other modifiers), and are larger, but consume more mana when summoned.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Adds an 8 second cooldown to sacrifice. Sacrifice always creates a blood wraith when you sacrifice a minion. Blood wraiths have 100% more health and damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), and 40% increased size.\n\nThis effect cannot trigger if the minion you sacrifice is a blood wraith.

node.altText: {Blood Wraiths} have a base of 100 health, decay over time, and use melee attacks.
node.description: {Blood Wraiths} summoned by Sacrifice have more maximum health and deal more damage (both multiplicative with other modifiers).

nodeList.altText: {Blood Wraiths} have a base of 100 health, decay over time, and use melee attacks.
nodeList.description: {Blood Wraiths} leech a portion of the damage they deal as health. Sacrifice has a greater chance to summon a Blood Wraith.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Blood Wraiths leech [25%] of damage as health per point. Sacrifice has [5%] additional chance per point to summon a blood wraith when you sacrifice a minion.

node.loreText: Your minions are created to serve you one way or another
node.nodeDescription: Rips apart an allied minion, dealing physical damage to enemies around it. Added damage applies at double effectiveness.

nodeList.altText: {Bone Nova} scales with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
nodeList.description: {Bone Nova} projectiles travel faster, causing them to travel further.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Bone Nova's projectiles travel [25%] faster and further per point.

node.altText: {Bone Nova} scales with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
node.description: Sacrifice creates a {Bone Nova} that launches projectile bones that deal physical damage on hit from the minion sacrificed, but costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Sacrificing a minion also creates a bone nova around the minion. Enemies hit by the initial blast of the sacrifice cannot be hit by the bone nova, but the shards of bone from the nova do travel further out and can hit enemies outside the range of the initial blast.

node.loreText: Your minions are created to serve you one way or another
node.nodeDescription: Rips apart an allied minion, dealing physical damage to enemies around it. Added damage applies at double effectiveness.

nodeList.description: Sacrifice is recast onto other minions within its area of effect, which can happen multiple times. Sacrifice costs more mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: 60% increased mana cost. Sacrifice chains between your minions. That is to say if a minion is within the area of the initial sacrifice it will also be sacrificed and minions within the area of that sacrifice will also be sacrifice and so on.

node.description: Sacrifice deals damage in a larger area if you have three or more minions active when you cast Sacrifice.
